name: Farm Jam
description:
In Farm Jam you must fulfil orders by planting, growing, picking and delivering produce.
Race against the clock with a friend (or by yourself for an extra challenge) to get as many points as possible.

Points
Delivered item: +20
Completed delivery: +20
Missed delivery: -25/missed item

Controls


MoveInteractRed Player
WASDSpaceGreen Player
ArrowsRight Shift

This game was heavily inspired by Brackey's video, so I recommend you go check that out.
